title: 新手作，脱出妖怪監狱！！
author: sdfg8898
txt_content:

先看出生点

拿好装了？去打调零？no~no~no~先打小兵吧！

replies.author: hdgogordon
replies.txt_content: Well I'll tell you something here kid, for a newbie like you, it's fine. All right? Don't listen to anybody but me. You might not be as good as me, but you're awesome.
